query:
SELECT 
  c.id,
  c.name,
  COUNT(pc.productId) as product_count
FROM categories c
LEFT JOIN product_categories pc ON c.id = pc.categoryId
WHERE c.id IN (5, 13, 14, 15)
GROUP BY c.id, c.name
ORDER BY c.id;
